pageContent: (function() { var searchForm = document.querySelector('.search-kb-fix'); var hiddenInput = document.createElement('input'); hiddenInput.setAttribute("type", "hidden"); hiddenInput.setAttribute("name", "filter_by"); hiddenInput.setAttribute("value", "knowledge_base"); searchForm.appendChild(hiddenInput); })() Need help?
